  • Method Details

    • getAvailableDoctors

      public List<Doctor> getAvailableDoctors(LocalDate date)
      Gets a list of available doctors on a given date. A doctor is considered available if they have set availability on the given date and if the time is not in the past (for the current day).
      Specified by:
      getAvailableDoctors in interface DoctorAvailabilityService
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check for available doctors.
      Returns:
      A list of available doctors for the given date.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Sets the availability for a doctor on a specific date and time range. The method checks for validity of inputs such as non-null parameters, valid time range, and that the date is not in the past. If valid, it saves the availability.
      Specified by:
      setAvailability in interface DoctorAvailabilityService
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor for whom availability is being set.
      date - The date the doctor is available.
      startTime - The start time of the doctor's availability.
      endTime - The end time of the doctor's availability.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are invalid.

    • generateSlots

      public List<AppointmentSlot> generateSlots(DoctorAvailability availability)
      Generates appointment slots for a doctor based on their availability for a given date. The method divides the availability time into slots of fixed duration and returns them.
      Specified by:
      generateSlots in interface DoctorAvailabilityService
      Parameters:
      availability - The doctor's availability for a given date.
      Returns:
      A list of appointment slots.

    • getSlotByDateTime

      public AppointmentSlot getSlotByDateTime(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Retrieves an appointment slot for a doctor on a specific date and time. The method checks if the doctor is available at the given time and returns the corresponding slot.
      Specified by:
      getSlotByDateTime in interface DoctorAvailabilityService
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor for whom the slot is being retrieved.
      date - The date to check for availability.
      time - The time to check for availability.
      Returns:
      The appointment slot if available, otherwise null.

    • getDoctorAvailabilities

      public List<DoctorAvailability> getDoctorAvailabilities(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves all availabilities for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availabilities are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of DoctorAvailability for the specified doctor.

    • getAvailabilitiesByDate

      public List<DoctorAvailability> getAvailabilitiesByDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves all availabilities for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check for doctor availabilities.
      Returns:
      A list of DoctorAvailability for the specified date.

    • removeAvailability

      public boolean removeAvailability(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date)
      Removes a doctor's availability for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availability is to be removed.
      date - The date of the availability to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the availability was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • updateAvailability

      public boolean updateAvailability(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date, LocalTime newStartTime, LocalTime newEndTime)
      Updates the availability of a doctor for a specific date. The method checks if the availability exists and then attempts to set the new availability.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availability is to be updated.
      date - The date to update the availability for.
      newStartTime - The new start time of the doctor's availability.
      newEndTime - The new end time of the doctor's availability.
      Returns:
      true if the availability was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • isDoctorAvailable

      public boolean isDoctorAvailable(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Checks if a doctor is available at a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor to check availability for.
      date - The date to check.
      time - The time to check.
      Returns:
      true if the doctor is available, false otherwise.

    • getNextAvailableSlot

      public Optional<AppointmentSlot> getNextAvailableSlot(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves the next available appointment slot for a doctor within the next 7 days. The method checks each day for availability and returns the first available slot.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor for whom the next available slot is being checked.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the next available appointment slot, if found.
